messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to a rounding error, a large amount of hostile clowns are heading to the station.

ETA of clowns: 10 minutes.

We suggest that you prepare.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
We have locked on to your bluespace signatures.

Each personnel may request one item via rapid delivery prayer.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CLOWN ETA: 2 MINUTES.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CLOWNS INBOUND.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: BLAST 1: INCOMING AT ARRIVALS!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Blast 1: Terminated.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: BLAST 2: PRIMARY HALLWAY

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: BLAST 3: CARGO HALLWAY

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attempting to get an ERT and rescue team.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ERT INBOUND!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.
